name: Village Prototype
description:
Difficult to currently describe even as a prototype. At the moment you can:

  • Look and move with mouse and WASD
  • Right click to build pieces, left click to remove them
  • R to rotate before placing
  • Mouse scroll to change piece
  • Press P to order the villager to (maybe) go where you're pointing
  • ESC to free the mouse (e.g. so you can close the game)

Coming in 0.0.2:

  • more pieces probably
  • maybe improved controls

Medium term plans:

  • autonomous villagers
  • resources
  • villager needs

Changelog (0.0.1, 2020-11-03):

- pointer in middle of screen
- R to rotate before placing
- show correct piece in blueprint
- changed path test key to P
- left click to remove object
- when object placed, villagers update pathfinding
- fixed jump not working while walking into a wall
- basic building pieces (wall and ramp)
- scroll wheel to change piece
